title: Missions  not showing WHY?

replies.body: You should be getting new daily missions each day at 11am PDT. I went ahead and pulled up your account, and it looks like you do have Awakened and One Blade, One Purpose available right now. You may need to refresh your client to get your new missions to pop up.
I tried a client repair and a re log, no dice. I wish you can add them on our web page accounts so we can our missions here too if we cant see them in game.

Sorry for the confusion, but this topic was 5 months old when an event was going on. That event gave you missions daily, but it has ended since then. The only daily missions going on at this time is the first win of the day mission.
I'm not able to get first win of the day missions, there's an orange circle with a one in it but when I click on the missions it shows nothing.
I have this problem too i can complete the missions i just cant see what i have to do in order to complete them

I haven't been able to get any missions for about a month now ever since the VS event I got the missions from VS,but after it was over all my ordinary missions unrelated to VS do not show up this has been going on for about a month and I don't know if its just me doing something wrong or what may have happened. I would love to know what may have happened and how i could fix it.
